name: Pay Me In Colors
description:
Pay Me In Colors is a 2D platformer game inspired by the classics of the past. The game is divided in 6 worlds, each one gives a different and challenging mechanic to explore, run through many levels and accept the challenge of giving the world colors again.

Key features:

  • 40+ levels.
  • 6 worlds, each with a different mechanic to challenge you.
  • Simple and responsive controls.
  • Compatible with controllers.
